title: Wiki text reformatting to create headers
original_prompt:
Modify this text:
scale([x,y,z])
resize([x,y,z],auto)
mirror([x,y,z])
multmatrix(m)
color("colorname",alpha)
color([r,g,b,a])
offset(r|delta,chamfer)
hull()
Minkowski()
 
To follow this format:
==== translate() ====
 
translate([x,y,z])
 
==== rotate() ====
 
rotate([x,y,z])
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "modify_text": [
            "scale([x,y,z])",
            "resize([x,y,z],auto)",
            "mirror([x,y,z])",
            "multmatrix(m)",
            "color(\"colorname\",alpha)",
            "color([r,g,b,a])",
            "offset(r|delta,chamfer)",
            "hull()",
            "Minkowski()"
        ],
        "format": [
            "==== translate() ====",
            "translate([x,y,z])",
            "==== rotate() ====",
            "rotate([x,y,z])"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: scale([1,2,3]) resize([4,5,6],auto) mirror([7,8,9]) multmatrix([[1,0,0],[0,1,0],[0,0,1]]) color("red",0.5) color([255,0,0,1]) offset(10|5,chamfer) hull() Minkowski()
input2: scale([10,20,30]) resize([40,50,60],auto) mirror([70,80,90]) multmatrix([[0,1,0],[1,0,0],[0,0,1]]) color("blue",0.8) color([0,0,255,0.9]) offset(15|10,chamfer) hull() Minkowski()
